name: Bubble Girl (itch)
description:
Help Bubble Girl fill all the bad bubbles with sugar to turn them good again!

This was my very fist Game Jam and even more than that, it was my very first game ever made!  It's very short, but I learned a ton and look forward to developing something more detailed in the future!

I absolutely loved this event and will definitely do this again, especially when I have honed my skills more!
